title: Winter is gone? 70* degrees in PAC NW
body:
Today it reached 68 * degrees, I am officially terrified now that I bought special year lasting water, 1 generator with 3 year fuel supplie, and 5 AC portable units. I am not joking when this might be the last year of shit being some-what normal, prepared for **Mad Max Desert storm**

a good skin idea...

I think Graves should get a **Mad Max Skin** :D or Highnoon Skin
